name: White or black
description:
White or black is a video game prototype in which you will have to crush the selected color and get enough points to go to the next level.

The video game has, for now, only three levels and no settings, if you like the idea and receive a little financial support ($ 20), I will expand the game by adding levels and settings.

I hope you like the game and leave feedback on what to improve or any bugs, have fun.
